newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 7,377 to dlr on July 31 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 7,377 to dlr on July 31 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's central bank (BNR) said on Friday it had calculated the indicative rate of the local leu currency at 7,377 to the dollar for August 1.

The rate, which is not compulsory for book-keeping operations or interbank deals, is used by the finance ministry, customs authorities, prosecutors' offices and police, as well as for statistical purposes.
It is computed daily, based on prices quoted by commercial banks operating on Romania's foreign exchange market.
The rate was 7,354 lei to the dollar on Thursday.
